title: I don't understand Vayne man.
body:
She has wicked power spikes all throughout the game.

She's hard to gank without ten billion forms of CC.

She instantly punishes people and kills them.

Her only counters can't actually duel her they can only deny her CS and harass her early game and then can do very little if she doesn't get camped or shut down and with a sustain/poke support like Sona or a sustain zoner support like Soraka she basically wins lane and wins game if you don't have a ridiculous amount of CC or huge burst engages and if they have a strong frontline you're basically done for.

replies.body: Only the things you are listing happen to really good vaynes

{{champion:9}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:157}} <-- (Hard to duel/dodge CC) {{champion:429}} <-- (in lane) {{champion:39}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:79}}  <-- (last 2 are generally super tanky and build frozenheart+randuins= 0attkspeed)

And ofcourse all the champions you picked - Taric Qss eliminates him as a problem. I perm ban Annie Vi 3rd ban generally sej/grag for the team or lb being selfish
Its not that hard, just buy a Sweper and upgrade it...dont  know why people dont get this

> Complaining about Vayne being OP
 > xdxd

She's easy to lane against. 
Don't stand near walls so that you don't get CCed.

Buy Vision Wards to counter her.

She doesn't outdamage anyone.
All of her damage is from her autoattacks. Stun her and delete her. 
Every other ADC has  a dash to duel Vayne effectively.

EDIT: *Every other ADC has superior range.*

Vayne soraka sucks so bad

Ten billion forms of CC?

... m8
you must be in vayne.....phreak senpai notice me!

I haven't had a problem with Vayne since season 3. So easy.

Vayne is weaker than ever right now due to {{item:3362}} being 250g now. (assuming you are smart enough to buy one.)

I'll take a Kalista, Jinx, Ashe, Graves or Lucian on my team any day.
You can shut her down early really hard, dont stand near walls (or to close to them) some other stuff idk
